Description: Epiphone Blueshawk Deluxe From Epiphone: Featuring new P-90 PRO Single Coil Pickups plus 6-position Rotary VariTone Epiphone presents the new Blueshawk Deluxe, the long awaited return of the original classic first introduced in the 90s that's been a guitar connoisseur's favorite ever since. The Blueshawk Deluxe features the same upper bout curve and cutaway of a Les Paul but with the semi-hollowbody design and small f-holes of an Epiphone archtop. The result is one of the most versatile and distinctive guitars anywhere. And now the Epiphone Blueshawk Deluxe features new P-90 PRO Single Coil pickups plus a 6-position Rotary VariTone . Epiphone Epiphone has been a household name with artists and players alike for over 120 years. Creating some of the most memorable and innovative instruments of our time, it's classic arch top guitars have remained ubiquitous in rock 'n roll lore. Specs: Body: Mahogany with contoured back Top: Maple with AAA Flame Maple Veneer Neck: Mahogany Neck Shape: SlimTaper D-shaped Joint: Glued-in Truss Rod: Adjustable Scale: 25.5" Fretboard: Rosewood with pearloid "Diamond" inlays Radius: 12" Frets: 22 medium jumbo Bridge Pickup: Epiphone P-90T PRO Single Coil Middle Pickup: Hum-cancelling "dummy" coil mounting between pickups inside body Neck Pickup: Epipohone P-90R PRO Single Coil Controls: Master Volume Master Tone with VariTone True Bypass 6-position Rotary VariTone : Position-1: No Effect Position-2: 5dB at 1875Hz Position-3:6dB at 1090Hz Position-4:7dB at 650Hz Position-5:10dB at 350Hz Position-6:14dB at 130Hz Bridge: Nighthawk fully-adjustable and String-Thru body Nut Width: 1. 68" Hardware: Nickel Binding: Body and Fingerboard Machine Heads: Epiphone "Deluxe" 18:1 Ratio ﻿Case: ﻿(not included)On Dec-22-18 at 22:08:21 PST, seller added the following information: This guitar has been played only a few times for less than an hour total. Still like new. Sounds as good as it looks.
Title: Epiphone Blueshawk Deluxe Semi-Hollowbody Electric Guitar Translucent Black
